extendedInfo.description: Play as He-Man, the man so manly they had to name him twice! Defend the secrets of Castle Grayskull against the evil forces of Skeletor! Featuring epic battles, awesome attacks, and all your favorite heroic Masters of the Universe, He-Man: The Most Powerful Game in the Universeâ¢ brings He-Man, the Most Powerful Man in the Universe  from planet Eternia to Android. Finally, By the Power of Grayskull, I have the Power!Game Features:â¢ He-Man characters and world that fans know and love remastered for the modern generation.â¢ 27 action-packed levels spread across 7 areas of Eternia.â¢ Fluid, intuitive controls for stunning swordplay.â¢ Huge boss fights with He-Man's greatest foes including Beast Man and Skeletor.â¢ Strengthen He-Man with fabulous secret powers and upgrades.

reviews.title: Very good!
reviews.comment: Been waiting for this! Not disappointed. Very good and fun! Jumping works strange though, and can\'t always seem to make it work (A lot of the time He-Man just swings his sword instead). 5 stars if this were somehow improved.
reviews.author: Kevin Turcotte

reviews.title: No worky
reviews.comment: Won\'t play until I can post to fb to get the gems.  Would rather that you used the google+ api to post there.  Kinda loathe fb.....:-P
reviews.author: Rich Turpin

reviews.title: Lots of Fun!
reviews.comment: Great game. I love it! I can\'t get the app to post on my Facebook to get the 1000 bonus gems (but I can with other apps), but everything else is fantastic about this game! I hope we get more levels or a sequel.  :)
reviews.author: Eric DeLima

reviews.title: Force Closes....
reviews.comment: The game is great, but it keeps Force Closing on me every time I either finish a level or try to exit to the main menu.
reviews.author: L. BellShock

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Been a MOTU fan for 30 years, fun game. I\'ve been waiting for a while for this after I saw it on iOS.
reviews.author: Joe Andreucci

reviews.title: Add shield control
reviews.comment: Best he-man game ever made.  Good graphics. Controls well but please Add nvidia shield controls please
reviews.author: Bluegrass Ky

reviews.title: entertaining
reviews.comment: chillingo typically makes solid games.. this one is solid as well, especially for the price. just add google play games support so i can sync across devices, and this is a 5 star app. still waiting on air mail too come to android also. oh one more thing, controller support would be nice.
reviews.author: Darius Moss

reviews.title: Fun, but annoying the IAPs are a killjoy!
reviews.comment: This game is fun, being asked to buy something at the end of every level becoming annoying.  This game also is a battery killer.
reviews.author: Alvin Johnson

reviews.title: Fun nostalgia for kids of the 80\'s
reviews.comment: It\'s a pretty simple side scroller and not terribly difficult. Lots of upgrades and new skills to keep you playing. Most of all the humor is really corny with a lot of references the old he man show. It\'s worth $0.99 just for the laughs.
reviews.author: rusty merritt

reviews.comment: I love it, graphics are good gameplay is good. It really takes you back. Hope they do more.......
reviews.author: Justin Minnick

reviews.title: It crashed after I finished a level
reviews.comment: This games worth it but can you please fix that pro lblem
reviews.author: Julian Rodriguez

reviews.title: Great fun!
reviews.comment: The issue with the download has been fixed.  The game works and it is fun to play!
reviews.author: Eugenio Angueira

reviews.title: I HAVE THE POWER!!!
reviews.comment: From the graphics to the controls, level designs and fighting mechanics, this game has true POWER! For all of those complaining of crashes and other issues...get a new phone because you\'re lowering the score for a game that deserves to be an \"editor\'s choice\". Excellent work devs, keep that good work coming with new levels and hopefully more playable characters with future updates.  ;-)
reviews.author: Christopher K.

reviews.title: The Most Powerful Game in the Play Store!
reviews.comment: Love it!!  Some of the special moves did not work right and I beat it in less than 24 hours. Battlecat would be nice in update,  more levels,  characters,  power ups, etc.  Awesome game.  Keep up the good work Chillingo!  Now if you would just make robbery Bob work on my LGBT optimus showtime 4.0 IS Thanks
reviews.author: Nathaniel Ward

reviews.title: Nice idea, but...
reviews.comment: It isn\'t a game I see myself playing. The levels are repetitive, and the control system is clunky. Could of been better.
reviews.author: David Carter

reviews.title: Hits that nostalgia spot
reviews.comment: Looks good and crisp but controls can be tricky especially when trying to slash one direction then turning to slash in the opposite. There are two control schemes(swipe and on screen buttons)to try out to see which is better for you. Gems are everywhere even when destroying environment and for $2 you can double the collection rate. Heman is powerful but shera is quicker and jumps higher. Thanks to support for detailing the iap(3 types)for me before buying the game. Very happy with the $3 I spent.
reviews.author: Jo Mama

reviews.title: Just excellent!
reviews.comment: Finally, He-Man on Android! Amazing game! Great platforming controls despite being a touch screen game. The art is fantastic and the game flows very nicely. There is also a lot of lore pieces to collect that give back story that I never knew about or forgot over time, which I thought was a neat touch! There are some minor inaccuracies with the He-Man universe in the game, but the quality of the game more than makes up for that! Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Chocobonstrife D

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Great game! I grew up with he man, so this is classic! Even though now seeing the old cartoon I realize how corny it is, the game is still a lot of fun.
reviews.author: Dead Fall

reviews.title: Yes yes yes
reviews.comment: I been waiting for an action arcade with a relevant character, a lot of us gamers grew up watching he man,superman, captain america, spiderman, batman, the incredible hulk, aka bruce banner, dare devil, wolverine, and so on, btw, these would all b great games if they were made like this or in some similar platformer state even over head view, this game is well-made in my opinion and high replayabilty. Thanks to the Devs, please make more like it.
reviews.author: Jay S

reviews.title: Love this game!!!!!!
reviews.comment: A must have for any He Man fan boy.  Would give 5 stars but crashes from time to time. Not much though.
reviews.author: Jeremy Swaney
